summary: A 2048x2048 detailed retexture of hanging moss, found in many places in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.cubeupload.com/87gtrB.gif[/img][img]http://u.cubeupload.com/deanoman/logonexus.png[/img]
[img]https://s12.postimg.org/8ob8pnxml/frozen.png[/img]

A 2048x2048 or 1024x1024 (optional) detailed retexture of hanging moss, found in many places in Skyrim.

Version 1.2 now includes the blue hanging moss found in the Dragonborn DLC.

I've made the texture to be a more destaurated green, more dense and have more detail and "mossyness". [See images]

Please rate and endorse. Also comment if you'd like me to make some changes :D

Installation:

Install using Nexus Mod Manager or manually install it by extracting it to your "Data" folder.

[color=orange]This is the final version of this mod. I am no longer playing Skyrim and will not be continuing to update my files on the Skyrim Nexus anymore. All the best! :D[/color]

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1015221]Please check out all my mods![/url]
author: Deanoman

files.name: Hanging Moss Textures 2048x2048
files.changelogHtml:
Desaturated texture
Added support for lower resolution option
Included the blue hanging moss found in the Dragonborn DLC
